00007 using RobotFootballCore.Utilities;
00008 using System.Threading.Tasks;
00009 using System.Collections.Generic;
00010 using System.Threading;

00012 namespace RouteFinders
00013 {
00014     public class ParallelHashSetAStarRouteFinder : RouteFinder
00015     {
00016         public int ObjectClearance { get; set; }
00017 
00018         public ParallelHashSetAStarRouteFinder()
00019         {
00020             Resolution = new Size(10, 10);
00021             ObjectClearance = 20;
00022         }
00023 
00024         private GridSquare[] InitGrid(PointF startPoint, PointF endPoint, Field field, Size gridSize, IPositionedObject movingObject)
00025         {
00026             var playersize = (movingObject.Size + new Size(ObjectClearance, ObjectClearance)).Scale(Resolution).Scale(2.0f).Ceiling();
00027             var clearance = Math.Max(playersize.Width, playersize.Height); // The amount to increase an obstacle's size by to allow for the player's size
00028 
00029             var grid = new GridSquare[gridSize.Height * gridSize.Width];
00030             // Initialize the grid
00031             Parallel.For(0, grid.Length, i =>
00032             {
00033                 grid[i] = new GridSquare();
00034                 grid[i].Location = PointExtensions.FromIndex(i, gridSize.Width);
00035             });
00036 
00037             Parallel.ForEach(from p in field.Players where p.Team == Team.Opposition select p, player =>
00038             {
00039                 var centerGridPoint = player.Position.Scale(Resolution).Floor();
00040 
00041                 var minX = Math.Max(0, centerGridPoint.X - playersize.Width - clearance);
00042                 var maxX = Math.Min(centerGridPoint.X + playersize.Width + clearance, gridSize.Width);
00043                 var minY = Math.Max(0, centerGridPoint.Y - playersize.Height - clearance);
00044                 var maxY = Math.Min(centerGridPoint.Y + playersize.Height + clearance, gridSize.Height);
00045 
00046                 for (var i = minX; i < maxX; i++)
00047                 {
00048                     for (var j = minY; j < maxY; j++)
00049                     {
00050                         if (i < 0 || j < 0)
00051                             continue;
00052 
00053                         var gridPoint = new Point(i, j);
00054                         grid[gridPoint.ToIndex(gridSize.Width)].Type = SquareType.Obstacle;
00055                     }
00056                 }
00057             });
00058 
00059             var gridEndPoint = endPoint.Scale(Resolution).Floor();
00060 
00061             grid[gridEndPoint.ToIndex(gridSize.Width)].Type = SquareType.Destination;
00062 
00063             var gridStartPoint = startPoint.Scale(Resolution).Floor();
00064             grid[gridStartPoint.ToIndex(gridSize.Width)].Type = SquareType.Origin;
00065 
00066             return grid;
00067         }
00068 
00069         public override Route FindPath(PointF startPoint, PointF endPoint, Field field, IPositionedObject movingObject)
00070         {
00071             if (Resolution.Height < 1 || Resolution.Width < 1)
00072                 throw new InvalidOperationException("Resolution must be greater than or equal to 1 pixel by 1 pixel");
00073 
00074             var gridSize = field.Size.Scale(Resolution).Ceiling();
00075 
00076             var grid = InitGrid(startPoint, endPoint, field, gridSize, movingObject);
00077 
00078             var startPoints = from g in grid where g.Type == SquareType.Origin select g;
00079 
00080             var closedSet = new HashSet<GridSquare>(); // The already checked points
00081             var openSet = new HashSet<GridSquare>(from g in grid where g.Type == SquareType.Origin select g); // The points to check
00082             var cameFrom = new Dictionary<GridSquare, GridSquare>(); // A list of route data already calculated
00083 
00084             // Initialise the origin points
00085             Parallel.ForEach(startPoints, g => { g.KnownScore = 0; g.HeuristicScore = CalculateHeuristic(g, endPoint); });
00086 
00087             // While there are points available to check
00088             while (openSet.Any())
00089             {
00090                 var square = openSet.OrderBy(p => p.TotalScore).First();
00091                 if (square.Type == SquareType.Destination)
00092                 {
00093                     var path = ReconstructPath(cameFrom, cameFrom[square]);
00094                     path.Path.Add(new LineSegment(cameFrom[square].Location, square.Location));
00095                     path.Scale(Resolution.Invert()); // Convert the path back to world coordinates from grid coordinates
00096                     return path;
00097                 }
00098 
00099                 openSet.Remove(square);
00100                 closedSet.Add(square);
00101 
00102                 var index = square.Location.ToIndex(gridSize.Width);
00103 
00104                 // Calculate the neighbouring indexes and discard the ones out of range.
00105                 var neighbourIndexes = new[] { index + 1, 
00106                                                index - 1, 
00107                                                index + gridSize.Width, 
00108                                                index - gridSize.Width,
00109                                                index + gridSize.Width + 1, 
00110                                                index - gridSize.Width + 1,
00111                                                index + gridSize.Width - 1, 
00112                                                index - gridSize.Width - 1 }.Where(i => (i >= 0) && (i < grid.Length));
00113 
00114                 var openSetLock = new ReaderWriterLockSlim();
00115                 var cameFromLock = new ReaderWriterLockSlim();
00116 
00117                 Parallel.ForEach(neighbourIndexes, i =>
00118                 {
00119                     var neighbour = grid[i];
00120 
00121                     if (closedSet.Contains(neighbour))
00122                         return; // Already checked this square. Skip it
00123 
00124                     // Work out the distance to the origin
00125                     var tentativeKnownScore = square.KnownScore + CalculateLength(square.Location, neighbour.Location);
00126 
00127                     bool tentativeIsBetter = false;
00128 
00129                     openSetLock.EnterUpgradeableReadLock();
00130                     if (!openSet.Contains(neighbour))
00131                     {
00132                         openSetLock.EnterWriteLock();
00133                         // First time this point has been considered. The current distance is the best guess.
00134                         openSet.Add(neighbour);
00135                         openSetLock.ExitWriteLock();
00136                         neighbour.HeuristicScore = CalculateHeuristic(neighbour, endPoint);
00137                         tentativeIsBetter = true;
00138                     }
00139                     else if (tentativeKnownScore < neighbour.KnownScore)
00140                         // Point has been considered before and the last consideration was given a higher score, so use the knew one.
00141                         tentativeIsBetter = true;
00142                     else
00143                         // Point has been considered before and the last consideration was given a lower score, so use that one.
00144                         tentativeIsBetter = false;
00145                     openSetLock.ExitUpgradeableReadLock();
00146 
00147                     if (tentativeIsBetter)
00148                     {
00149                         cameFromLock.EnterWriteLock();
00150                         // If necessary, update the square's known score and note the path to that square.
00151                         cameFrom[neighbour] = square;
00152                         neighbour.KnownScore = tentativeKnownScore;
00153                         cameFromLock.ExitWriteLock();
00154                     }
00155                 });
00156             }
00157 
00158             return null;
00159         }
00160 
00161         private Route ReconstructPath(Dictionary<GridSquare, GridSquare> cameFrom, GridSquare currentSquare)
00162         {
00163             if (cameFrom.ContainsKey(currentSquare))
00164             {
00165                 var path = ReconstructPath(cameFrom, cameFrom[currentSquare]);
00166                 path.Path.Add(new LineSegment(cameFrom[currentSquare].Location, currentSquare.Location));
00167                 return path;
00168             }
00169             return new Route();
00170         }
00171 
00172         private float CalculateHeuristic(GridSquare square, PointF endPoint)
00173         {
00174             if (square.Type == SquareType.Obstacle)
00175                 return float.PositiveInfinity;
00176             else
00177                 return CalculateLength(square.Location, endPoint);
00178         }

00180 
00181     }
